column4: can anyone help me i can change my usb-drive from read-only mode....
anyone knows how to change this so i can add files to it?
does it automount or do you mount it manually?
i manually mount it. i did chmod 777 /media/*** and changed the permisions but i cant do anyting still
is it NTFS FAT32 EXT3 or what?
how can i know that? i guess its FAT32 but im not really sure
I think you need to edit the /etc/fstab file and then either restart or mount it with the "sudo mount -a" command
k let me know how it goes, you got that link right?
no i cant do anything it says there
